systemDescription: The Dashboard should highlight correlations and dependencies between features, and cluster similar datapoints (patients). It is built of 3 visual areas,firstly a heatmap, secondly a scatterplot or histogram (toggled), and thirdly PCA biplot. Only the described views and interactions are implemented, no additional buttons or filtering. Interaction methods are limited to their view.

interactions.checkbox: Select Features to display in heatmap
interactions.click non-diagonal cell: shows and updates scatterplot with selected feature pair
interactions.click diagonal cell: shows and updates histogram with selected feature

views.Display condition: Toggle with histogram, displayed if non-diagonal heatmap cell (feature pair) is selected

options: Test method of Y-axis feature (available only for z-scores)

views.Display condition: Toggle with scatterplot, displayed if diagonal heatmap cell (single feature) is clicked

options: Test method of Y-axis feature (available only for z-scores)

button.function: Run k-means clustering with selected number of clusters and update color encoding

viewRelationships.description: Selecting a non-diagonal heatmap cell (feature pair) sets the X and Y features in the scatterplot.
Selecting a diagonal heatmap cell (single feature) sets the X feature for the histogram.
